Articles.Content:
Just wanted to say hi to everyone!!! been playing for 3 days now and I finally landed on the Mun!!!!! now i need to figure out how to do my mun landing a lot more fuel efficient. i always end up really far from the Mun when i get sucked into orbit around it and burn a ton of fuel on my approach.

Anyways here is a screenie!!!

well back to my game to see if i have enough fuel for a return trip!!!!

Edit: I didnt . i fastfowarded till the moon was in a good spot to launch from and i crashed for some reason.....i think i ran out of rcs fuel that was holding me up.
In that shot, your rocket strongly resembles the monolith. I like it.

Welcome and congratz!

You should install a landing module mod such as simple legs to help stabilize your landings
Great! A Mun landing, no matter how early or late, is a major milestone. Congratulations!
Congratz, I have not landed in the moon. Yet.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

I did it again !!! Almost all stock parts this time. only the lander legs are added!!!!

Off to try and get it home!
